2008 deaths

11 January 2009

An amazing number of famous and influential people passed in 2008. Here is my list of the ones I found most interesting:

  • Clive Barnes
  • Sunny von Bulow
  • George Carlin
  • Arthur C. Clarke
  • Michael Crichton
  • Dr. Michael DeBakey
  • Mark Felt
  • Bobby Fischer
  • Isaac Hayes
  • Jeff Healey
  • Jesse Helms
  • Charlton Heston
  • Sir Edmund Hillary
  • Albert Hofmann
  • Eartha Kitt
  • Harvey Korman
  • Yves Saint Laurent
  • Heath Ledger
  • Bernie Mac
  • Dick Martin
  • Anthony Minghella
  • Robert Mondavi
  • Paul Newman
  • Bettie Page
  • Dr. Randy Pausch
  • Harold Pinter
  • Sydney Pollack
  • Dith Pran
  • Tim Russert
  • Roy Scheider
  • Alexander Solzhenitsyn
  • Richard Wright
